properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT R.REPORT_NO , P.POST_NAME , RT.REPORT_TYPE_NAME , RE.REPORT_REASON , P.MEM_NICKNAME , R.REPORT_DATE , R.REPORT_CHECK , R.REPORT_CONTENT , R.REPORT_POST_NO FROM REPORT R JOIN REPORT_REASON RE USING(REPORT_REASON_NO) JOIN REPORT_TYPE RT USING(REPORT_TYPE_NO) JOIN POST P ON(R.report_post_no=P.POST_NO) WHERE R.MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY R.REPORT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE REPORT SET REPORT_CONTENT = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND REPORT_NO = ?
